pkgmetadata.longdescription: opap========opap is a library to access OPAP data.Look how easy it is to use:: import opap opap.get_last_draw("kino")Features--------- Retrieve last draw's results- Retrieve draw's results from specific draw id- Retrieve draw's results from an id range- Retrieve the last n draw's results- Retrieve draw's results between specific dates- Retrieve draw id's between specific dates- Retrieve last draw's id- Retrieve next draw's idInstallation------------Install opap by running:: pip install opapLicense-------The project is licensed under the MIT license.
